name: sleepwalk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to get out of bed and walk around while you are sleeping: I sleepwalked when I was a child. Try not to wake him when he's sleepwalking. See
sleepwalker
to act without paying any attention to what you are doing, or without thinking carefully about what might happen: She sleepwalked her way into a scandal. Until his cancer diagnosis, he had been sleepwalking through his life.
More examplesFewer examplesOne night he reportedly sleepwalked into sliding glass doors.Some studies suggest as many as a quarter of all children sleepwalk.Jenny still sleepwalks when she is ill.
